visual_critiques: Background color: Original uses a light theme with an off-white/cream background (#F7F7F7) and specific sections in a subtle darker grey (#E5E5E5) or light purple (#F0ECF6), while the Generated version uses a dark theme with a dominant dark navy blue background (#1A2B3C).
Text color: Original features dark text on a light background, whereas Generated uses light (white/light grey) text on a dark background.
Header 'Get Started' button: Original has a white button with a dark border and dark text. Generated has a bright blue button with white text and no border.
Logo colors: The Astral logo in the header of the Original is dark, blending with the light background. In the Generated, it's light (white/grey) to stand out against the dark background.
Hero section headline color: Original uses black for 'Changing the Way Python Work Gets Done'. Generated uses white.
Hero section graphics: The lightning bolt graphic in the Original is green. In the Generated, it's blue.

Company logos under 'Proudly Backed By': In the Original, Accel, Caffeinated, and Guillermo Rauch logos are white/light grey to contrast with a darker background. In the Generated, they are dark grey to contrast with the dark navy background, and the 'Caffeinated' logo is completely different.

Astral's Mission/Beliefs section background: Original uses a dark grey background (#3C4B44) with light green numbers. Generated uses a dark grey (#2A3742) but the numbers are white and the overall structure is different (two columns instead of one large block).
Astral's Mission/Beliefs text: Original uses a specific light green for bullet points. Generated uses white.

My Path to Astral section: Original has a white background with dark text. Generated integrates it into the dark theme with a dark grey background (#2A3742) and light text. The headshot is also different.
'We're growing the team' section: Original has a light purple background (#F0ECF6). Generated has a dark grey background (#2A3742).
Announcements section: Original has announcement titles in dark text on a light background. Generated uses light text on a dark grey background (#2A3742) and presents them in a card-like layout.
Call to Action section: Original uses a dark background (#2B2C30) with white text. Generated uses a dark background (#1A2B3C) with white text, but the button styling is different.

Footer: Original uses a dark background (#2B2C30) with light text. Generated uses the same dark background (#1A2B3C) as the rest of the page, with light text. The layout of links under headings is visually different. The copyright text is also visually different.
Overall aesthetic: Original presents a clean, modern, and light design. Generated presents a dark, more muted design.
Background color: Original uses a light grey/off-white (#F8F8F8) for the main content area, while the Generated uses a dark grey (#D6DCE7) with a gradient.
Header background: Original's header is integrated with the main content background, while the Generated has a distinct dark grey background (#2E343A).
Font colors: Original primarily uses dark grey/black text on a light background. Generated uses white or light grey text on a dark background for many sections.
Navigation bar styling: Original has a minimalist header with no distinct background for navigation, while Generated has a prominent dark background with a border-bottom on 'Blog' link.
Button styling: Original's 'Get started' button in the header is green (#47CE77) with white text. Generated's is blue (#4596F1) with white text and a softer corner radius.
Article card backgrounds: Original uses light backgrounds for article cards. Generated uses dark grey (#2E343A) for article cards.
Article images: The specific images used in the generated article cards are different from the original, although they serve the same purpose.
Article layout in 'News & Updates': Original shows multiple small articles in a grid. Generated only shows 3 prominent articles and fewer overall.
Date styling: Original dates are smaller, lighter grey text. Generated dates are more prominent and often white.
Podcast/Webinar section: Original shows multiple podcast/webinar items. Generated shows only two with distinct blue 'Listen Now' buttons.
Footer background: Original's footer has a dark grey background (#14161A). Generated's footer also has a dark grey background (#2E343A), but it appears slightly lighter and matches the header.
Footer 'Supercharge your Python tooling' text: Original uses a very large, bold, white font. Generated uses a smaller, less prominent white font.
Footer buttons: Original has two buttons ('Get Started' and 'Browse Docs') with specific styling (green and grey border). Generated uses blue and dark grey buttons that are visually distinct.
Footer navigation links: Original has multiple columns of links ('Ruff', 'uv', etc.). Generated combines them into two columns and the specific links and their order are slightly different.
Footer logo: Original's footer logo is placed centrally at the bottom. Generated's logo is on the left side, aligned with the text.
Background: Original is off-white (#FFFFFF), Generated is light gray (#EDF2F9).
Header background: Original is off-white, Generated is dark gray (#1A2B3C).
Header text color: Original uses dark gray for links, Generated uses white for links.
Header 'Get Started' button: Original has a green background (#51CF66) and white text, Generated has a light blue background (#3682F8) and white text.
Main heading font: Original uses a serif-like font, Generated uses a sans-serif font.
Main heading color: Original uses black, Generated uses black but with a slightly different hue.
Body text color: Original uses black, Generated uses black but with a slightly different hue and less contrast.
Link color: Original uses a dark purple-blue, Generated uses a lighter blue.
Footer call-to-action background: Original uses a dark purple (#1A1A2E), Generated uses a dark gray (#1A2B3C).
Footer call-to-action text: Original uses white, Generated uses white.
Footer content background: Original is off-white, Generated is dark gray (#1A2B3C).
Footer link text color: Original uses dark gray, Generated uses white.
Graph colors: The line colors in the 'Github Stars' graph are different between the original and generated.
Logo in footer: Original has a prominent large logo, Generated has a smaller, less detailed logo.
Star icon: Original has a star icon next to 'Get Started' in the header, Generated has a different star icon.
Background: Original is off-white/cream (#F8F8F8), Generated is dark gray (#1A1A1A).
Header: Original has a white background with black text, Generated has a dark background (#2B2B2B) with white text.
Text Color: Original uses primarily black text on a light background, Generated uses white or light gray text on a dark background.
Call-to-action button (Header): Original is bright green (#B5FF1A) with black text, Generated is light blue (#6D93D7) with white text.
Astral Logo/Icon: Original uses a black star icon, Generated uses a white star icon.
Blog Post Title Font: Original uses a sans-serif font, larger and bolder. Generated uses a different sans-serif, smaller and less prominent.
Navigation links (Header): Original links are black, Generated links are white.

Footer Background: Original has an off-white background with a purple section for 'Supercharge Python tooling'. Generated has a dark gray background for the main footer, with a dark blue section for 'Supercharge Python tooling'.
'Supercharge Python tooling' section: Original has a vibrant purple background (#5D1F7B) with white text. Generated has a dark blue background (#364E72) with white text.

Button styling ('Get Started', 'Browse Docs'): Original buttons have a more rectangular, slightly rounded shape and distinct colors. Generated buttons are more rounded and have a less vibrant color scheme.
Link styling: Original links are underlined and purple/blue. Generated links are blue and not consistently underlined.
Font Family: The overall font family across the generated page appears different from the original, especially in body text and headings.
Spacing: The vertical and horizontal spacing between elements, paragraphs, and sections in the generated page does not match the original.
Footer text alignment: Original footer text elements are left-aligned in columns, Generated footer text is centered or left-aligned with different column structures.
Background: Original is off-white/cream (#F8F8F8), Generated is dark blue (#2A3747).
Header background: Original is white, Generated is dark blue, blending with the page background.
Text color: Original uses dark grey/black text (#242220), Generated uses white text.
Accent color (links/buttons): Original uses a vibrant green (#50FA7B) for 'Get Started' button and some links, Generated uses light blue (#68BFF9) for the button and no specific accent for links.
Main heading font: Original uses a bolder, larger sans-serif font, Generated uses a smaller, less prominent font.
Navigation links: Original has subtle grey navigation links; Generated has white navigation links.
Footer background: Original has a distinct white background with a dark promotion section. Generated has a unified dark background for both the promotion and footer.
Call to action button in header: Original 'Get Started' button is vibrant green; Generated is light blue.
Footer company name and copyright: Original uses 'Astral' logo and text (#242220); Generated uses 'Astral, inc.' in white text.
Product versions in footer: Original lists products vertically with version numbers. Generated lists products horizontally with different spacing and font.
Promotional section gradient: Original has a subtle dark gradient (#1E1E1E to #0E0E0E) behind the 'Supercharge your Python tooling' text. Generated uses a solid dark blue (#2A3747) background.
Author/Date line: Original has 'Zanie Blue' and date (#242220) with a light grey background for the whole header area, Generated combines them with no specific background for the line itself.
List item markers: Original uses standard bullet points for lists; Generated uses hyphens and sometimes no clear marker for lists.
Code snippets/inline code: Original uses a distinct `monospace` font with a light background for inline code. Generated does not visually distinguish inline code.
Logo: Original has a small 'Astral' logo in the top left corner. Generated has no logo.
